section.p: You clamber up until you come to a mountain track. It rises up between a cleft in the rock, ahead of you.
A man steps out in front of you. He is clearly a soldier, but his clothes are rough and ready, as if he had been living in the wild for some time.

If you have the title King’s Champion, .
If not, but you have the codeword Ambuscade, .
If you have neither of the above, but you do have the codeword Ark, .
Otherwise read on.
The soldier looks you over critically. He signals that he wants to parley with you.
